name: RoboSports VR
storyline: Our first game, "Crazy Dodgeball", is all about attacking your opponent with an energy ball to score points. Dodge your opponent's throws or go for the catch and land a devastating counter-attack!Play in an arena like no other! Take cover behind dynamic energy barriers, or make a surprise attack through randomly appearing portals!What’s more, players can enjoy Crazy Dodgeball outside the arena. Players can use our camera to record and share exciting matches, or relax and listen to any of our tracks with the jukebox feature.
summary: RoboSports is a vast collection of online multiplayer sports games!
